messages.subject: tsuba pics, better ones
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Rich and Jim, et al., Here are some better pics of the tsuba. Wow. what a difference. I did not know the flash could alter the look and colour so much. It
messages.messageBody:
Hi Rich and Jim, et al., Here are some better pics of the tsuba. Wow.
what a difference. I did not know the flash could alter the look and
colour so much. It looks proper now.


http://ph.groups.yahoo.com/group/nihontostudy/photos/view/d020?b=5

http://ph.groups.yahoo.com/group/nihontostudy/photos/view/d020?b=6

http://ph.groups.yahoo.com/group/nihontostudy/photos/view/d020?b=7

OK, the story. At the group discussion about this tsuba and it's age
Mr. Gary Murtha suggests 1750 while Mr. Robert Haynes figures it is
1650. I am still waiting to verify Mito or not, but I am sure that is
what was said. I'll get back to you on that one. Much better looking
now, eh? John
